body:
Hello

A lot happened today...

I got promoted to official. BC lost their streak in the final (GG PPB) and I got promoted to leader in BC.

AMA
body_tagged:

replies.body: Third best Avicus team, you guys have the most potential. I don't really see a lot of you guys standing out from the rest, only 2 or 3. Your teamwork is what gets you so far, not individual talent.
replies.body_tagged: Third best Avicus team, you guys have the most potential. I don't really see a lot of you guys standing out from the rest, only 2 or 3. Your teamwork is what gets you so far, not individual talent.

replies.body: Opinions on all the teams that participated in the tournament?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions on all the teams that participated in the tournament?

replies.body:
PPB: Solid team, however they're inactive on Avicus.

Apollo: Third best Avicus team, you guys have the most potential. I don't really see a lot of you guys standing out from the rest, only 2 or 3. Your teamwork is what gets you so far, not individual talent.

Ethernal Cross: 4th best team, have a lot of potential as well but I think something is holding them back - raw skill.

Cacal: It's not going to work with the difference in timezones. They have decent potential but it's so hard for them to make tournaments first of all. They have some decent players, but nobody really stands out as a god.

Cronus: I don't really see them getting far, they need an experienced leader.

Kaldorei: Decent team, have some potential but their better players left. I also think they've gone completely inactive?

Fort: -
replies.body_tagged:

Ethernal Cross: 4th best team, have a lot of potential as well but I think something is holding them back - raw skill.

Cacal: It's not going to work with the difference in timezones. They have decent potential but it's so hard for them to make tournaments first of all. They have some decent players, but nobody really stands out as a god.

Cronus: I don't really see them getting far, they need an experienced leader.

Kaldorei: Decent team, have some potential but their better players left. I also think they've gone completely inactive?

Fort: -
